thread.title: Stephen Ricker

author: Stephen Ricker
title: Stephen Ricker
text: I have an old Volvo 240 that will need something or the other every now and then. eEuropart has a fairly extensive catalog of parts with most available to ship that day. I occasionally will need patience for a part coming over from Europe and that is not easy. They communicate this as soon as they can and keep me updated on the status, so it is no surprise when this happens.
